transcript:
Pierre muttered, winc- 
ing. 
"Thou hatest it. Then change it, purify thy- self; and as thou art purified, thou wilt gain wisdom. Look at your life, my dear sir. How have you spent it? In riotous orgies and de- bauchery, receiving everything from society and giving nothing in return. You have be- come the possessor of wealth. How have you used it? What have you done for your neigh- bor? Have you ever thought of your tens of thousands of slaves? Have you helped them physically and morally?
